name: test_e2e_with_logs[276_PATH_ENC_ADV_003]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_ENC_ADV_003` |
| **Name** | Double-encoded slash traversal |
| **Category** | PATH_TRAVERSAL |
| **Subcategory** | advanced_encoding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `..%252f..%252f/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `..%252f..%252f%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
